wikipedia_page.main: Ronald Hewitt (21 January 1924 – June 2011) was an English professional footballer who played as a goalkeeper in the Football League for Sheffield United and Lincoln City and in non-League football for Worksop Town, Grantham and Spalding United.

response: His uncle, Ron Hewitt, played in the Football League for Lincoln City in the 1940s.
